name: Artisan
description: You learned a trade at the hands of masters. Whether smith, weaver, or mason, your craft ties you to guilds and communities.

feature.name: Guild Bonds
feature.description: You can call upon fellow guild members for simple assistance. Guild halls offer lodging and may have connections to local merchants and officials.

traits.text: I take great pride in my work.
I judge others by the quality of their craft.
I always look for ways to improve things.
I enjoy talking shop with fellow artisans.
I am meticulous about every detail.
I keep my tools in perfect condition.
I see everything as a potential material.
I believe honest work is the highest virtue.

ideals.text: Community. My work serves the greater good.
Generosity. I use my skills to help others.
Freedom. Everyone should be free to create.
Greed. I work only for profit.
Tradition. I honor the methods of my masters.
Innovation. Old ways must give way to the new.

bonds.text: My guild is my second family.
I created something I am deeply proud of.
I am working on a masterpiece.
I seek rare materials for a special project.

flaws.text: I refuse to compromise on quality, even when impractical.
I am jealous of superior craftsmen.
I cannot resist showing off my work.
I am dismissive of those who cannot create.
I trust my creations more than people.
